014package org.microbean.bean;
015
016import java.lang.constant.Constable;
017import java.lang.constant.DynamicConstantDesc;
018import java.lang.constant.MethodHandleDesc;
019
020import java.util.Collections;
021
022import java.util.function.BiConsumer;
023import java.util.function.BiFunction;
024import java.util.function.BinaryOperator;
025import java.util.function.Function;
026import java.util.function.Supplier;
027
028import java.util.ArrayList;
029import java.util.Collection;
030import java.util.LinkedHashSet;
031import java.util.List;
032import java.util.Map;
033import java.util.Map.Entry;
034import java.util.Optional;
035import java.util.SequencedSet;
036import java.util.Set;
037
038import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
039import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentMap;
040
041import java.util.stream.Collector;
042import java.util.stream.Collector.Characteristics;
043
044import org.microbean.bean.Alternate.Resolver;
045
046import org.microbean.constant.Constables;
047
048import org.microbean.lang.TypeAndElementSource;
049
050import static java.lang.Integer.signum;
051
052import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.BSM_INVOKE;
053import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_Collection;
054import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_Map;
055
056import static java.util.Collections.unmodifiableSequencedSet;
057
058import static java.util.function.Predicate.not;
059
060import static org.microbean.bean.ConstantDescs.CD_Assignability;
061import static org.microbean.bean.ConstantDescs.CD_DefaultBeanSet;
062import static org.microbean.bean.ConstantDescs.CD_Resolver;
063import static org.microbean.bean.Qualifiers.anyAndDefaultQualifiers;
064import static org.microbean.bean.Qualifiers.defaultQualifiers;
065import static org.microbean.bean.Ranked.DEFAULT_RANK;
066
067import static org.microbean.scope.Scope.SINGLETON_ID;
068
069/**
070 * A straightforward {@link BeanSet} implementation.
071 *
072 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson/" target="_top">Laird Nelson</a>
073 */
074// Experimenting with making this non-final so the no-arg constructor can supply its own beans via some other
075// mechanism. Think ldc.
076public class DefaultBeanSet implements BeanSet, Constable {
077
078
079  /*
080   * Instance fields.
081   */
082
083
084  private final Resolver resolver;
085
086  private final Assignability assignability;
087
088  private final SequencedSet<Bean<?>> beansView;
089
090  // A cache of Beans that were selected by a BeanSelectionCriteria
091  private final ConcurrentMap<BeanSelectionCriteria, SequencedSet<Bean<?>>> selectionCache;
092
093  // Guaranteed to be a submap of selectionCache.
094  private final ConcurrentMap<BeanSelectionCriteria, Bean<?>> resolutionCache;
095
096
097  /*
098   * Constructors.
099   */
100
101
102  /**
103   * Creates a new, essentially useless, {@link DefaultBeanSet}.
104   *
105   * <p>Using this constructor will result in a {@link DefaultBeanSet} that contains only self-referential {@link
106   * Bean}s. It is probably useful only for proxying purposes.</p>
107   *
108   * @see #DefaultBeanSet(Assignability, Collection, Map, Resolver)
109   *
110   * @deprecated This constructor is for very specialized use cases only. Please use one of the other constructors
111   * instead.
112   */
113  @Deprecated
114  public DefaultBeanSet() {
115    this(new Assignability(), List.of(), Map.of(), StockResolver.INSTANCE);
116  }
117
118  /**
119   * Creates a new {@link DefaultBeanSet}.
120   *
121   * @param beans a {@link Collection} of {@link Bean}s; may be {@code null}; no reference to this object is
122   * retained
123   *
124   * @see #DefaultBeanSet(Assignability, Collection, Map, Resolver)
125   */
126  public DefaultBeanSet(final Collection<? extends Bean<?>> beans) {
127    this(new Assignability(), beans, Map.of(), StockResolver.INSTANCE);
128  }
129
130  /**
131   * Creates a new {@link DefaultBeanSet}.
132   *
133   * @param assignability an {@link Assignability}; may be {@code null} in which case a default one will be used
134   *
135   * @param beans a {@link Collection} of {@link Bean}s; may be {@code null}; no reference to this object is
136   * retained
137   *
138   * @see #DefaultBeanSet(Assignability, Collection, Map, Resolver)
139   */
140  public DefaultBeanSet(final Assignability assignability, final Collection<? extends Bean<?>> beans) {
141    this(assignability, beans, Map.of(), StockResolver.INSTANCE);
142  }
143
144  /**
145   * Creates a new {@link DefaultBeanSet}.
146   *
147   * @param assignability an {@link Assignability}; may be {@code null} in which case a default one will be used
148   *
149   * @param beans a {@link Collection} of {@link Bean}s; may be {@code null}; no reference to this object is
150   * retained
151   *
152   * @param preCalculatedResolutions a {@link Map} of {@link BeanSelectionCriteria} to {@link Bean}s representing
153   * already-resolved {@link Bean}s; may be {@code null}; no reference to this object is retained
154   *
155   * @param resolver a {@link Resolver}; may be {@code null} in which case a default one will be used
156   *
157   * @exception IllegalArgumentException if {@code preCalculatedResolutions} contains any {@link BeanSelectionCriteria}
158   * that does not {@linkplain BeanSelectionCriteria#selects(Bean) select its corresponding <code>Bean</code>}
159   */
160  @SuppressWarnings("this-escape")
161  public DefaultBeanSet(final Assignability assignability,
162                        Collection<? extends Bean<?>> beans,
163                        Map<? extends BeanSelectionCriteria, ? extends Bean<?>> preCalculatedResolutions,
164                        final Resolver resolver) {
165    super();
166    this.assignability = assignability == null ? new Assignability() : assignability;
167    this.resolver = resolver == null ? StockResolver.INSTANCE : resolver;
168    this.resolutionCache = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
169    this.selectionCache = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
170
171    beans = beans == null ? List.of() : beans;
172    preCalculatedResolutions = preCalculatedResolutions == null ? Map.of() : preCalculatedResolutions;
173    final List<Bean<?>> newBeans = new ArrayList<>(beans.size() + 2 + preCalculatedResolutions.size());
174    newBeans.addAll(beans);
175    for (final Entry<? extends BeanSelectionCriteria, ? extends Bean<?>> e : preCalculatedResolutions.entrySet()) {
176      final BeanSelectionCriteria bsc = e.getKey();
177      final Bean<?> b = e.getValue();
178      if (!bsc.selects(b)) {
179        throw new IllegalArgumentException("preCalculatedResolutions; beanSelectionCriteria (" + bsc + ") does not select bean (" + b + ")");
180      }
181      newBeans.add(b);
182      this.resolutionCache.put(bsc, b);
183    }
184    newBeans.add(this.resolverBean());
185    newBeans.add(this.bean());
186    Collections.sort(newBeans, DefaultBeanSet::compareRanks);
187    // Second pass to efficiently prime the selection cache now that validation has happened.
188    for (final BeanSelectionCriteria bsc : preCalculatedResolutions.keySet()) {
189      this.beans(bsc, newBeans);
190    }
191    this.beansView = unmodifiableSequencedSet(new LinkedHashSet<>(newBeans));
192
193    // Prime the selection and resolution caches with our beans.
194    final TypeAndElementSource tes = assignability.typeAndElementSource();
195    this.bean(new BeanSelectionCriteria(assignability, tes.declaredType(BeanSet.class), defaultQualifiers(), true), DefaultBeanSet::returnNull);
196    this.bean(new BeanSelectionCriteria(assignability, tes.declaredType(Resolver.class), defaultQualifiers(), true), DefaultBeanSet::returnNull);
197  }
198
199
200  /*
201   * Instance methods.
202   */
203
204
205  @Override // BeanSet
206  public final Bean<?> bean(final BeanSelectionCriteria beanSelectionCriteria) {
207    return this.bean(beanSelectionCriteria, Resolver::fail);
208  }
209
210  @Override // BeanSet
211  public final Bean<?> bean(final BeanSelectionCriteria beanSelectionCriteria,
212                            final BiFunction<? super BeanSelectionCriteria, ? super Collection<? extends Bean<?>>, ? extends Bean<?>> op) {
213    return this.resolutionCache.computeIfAbsent(beanSelectionCriteria, s -> this.resolver.resolve(s, this.beans(s), op));
214  }
215
216  @Override // BeanSet
217  public final SequencedSet<Bean<?>> beans() {
218    return this.beansView;
219  }
220
221  @Override // BeanSet
222  public final SequencedSet<Bean<?>> beans(final BeanSelectionCriteria beanSelectionCriteria) {
223    return this.beans(beanSelectionCriteria, this.beansView);
224  }
225
226  private final SequencedSet<Bean<?>> beans(final BeanSelectionCriteria beanSelectionCriteria,
227                                            final Collection<? extends Bean<?>> beans) {
228    return
229      this.selectionCache.computeIfAbsent(beanSelectionCriteria,
230                                          bsc -> beans.stream().filter(bsc::selects).collect(new BeanCollector()));
231  }
232
233  @Override // Constable
234  public Optional<DynamicConstantDesc<DefaultBeanSet>> describeConstable() {
235    return this.assignability.describeConstable()
236      .flatMap(aDesc -> Constables.describeConstable(this.beansView)
237               .flatMap(beansDesc -> Constables.describeConstable(this.resolutionCache)
238                        .flatMap(pcrDesc -> Constables.describeConstable(this.resolver)
239                                 .map(resolverDesc -> DynamicConstantDesc.of(BSM_INVOKE,
240                                                                             MethodHandleDesc.ofConstructor(CD_DefaultBeanSet,
241                                                                                                            CD_Assignability,
242                                                                                                            CD_Collection,
243                                                                                                            CD_Map,
244                                                                                                            CD_Resolver),
245                                                                             aDesc,
246                                                                             beansDesc,
247                                                                             pcrDesc,
248                                                                             resolverDesc)))));
249  }
250
251  /*
252   * Reporting- and snapshot-oriented methods.
253   */
254
255  public final Set<BeanSelectionCriteria> beanSelectionCriterias() {
256    return this.selectionCache.keySet();
257  }
258
259  public final SequencedSet<Bean<?>> resolvedBeans() {
260    return this.resolutionCache.values().stream().collect(new BeanCollector());
261  }
262
263  public final SequencedSet<Bean<?>> selectedBeans() {
264    return this.selectionCache.values().stream().flatMap(Set::stream).collect(new BeanCollector());
265  }
266
267  public final SequencedSet<Bean<?>> unselectedBeans() {
268    final SequencedSet<Bean<?>> selectedBeans = this.selectedBeans();
269    return this.beans().stream().filter(not(selectedBeans::contains)).collect(new BeanCollector());
270  }
271
272  /*
273   * Methods returning Beans for foundational constructs in this class.
274   */
275
276  private final Bean<DefaultBeanSet> bean() {
277    final TypeAndElementSource tes = this.assignability.typeAndElementSource();
278    return
279      new Bean<>(new Id(new BeanTypeList(List.of(tes.declaredType(DefaultBeanSet.class),
280                                                 tes.declaredType(BeanSet.class))),
281                        anyAndDefaultQualifiers(),
282                        SINGLETON_ID,
283                        DEFAULT_RANK - 100),
284                 new Singleton<>(this));
285  }
286
287  private final Bean<Resolver> resolverBean() {
288    final TypeAndElementSource tes = this.assignability.typeAndElementSource();
289    return
290      new Bean<>(new Id(new BeanTypeList(List.of(tes.declaredType(null, tes.typeElement(Resolver.class)))),
291                        anyAndDefaultQualifiers(),
292                        SINGLETON_ID,
293                        DEFAULT_RANK),
294                 new Singleton<>(this.resolver));
295  }
296
297
298  /*
299   * Static methods.
300   */
301
302
303  private static final int compareRanks(final Ranked b0, final Ranked b1) {
304    return signum(b0.rank() - b1.rank());
305  }
306
307  private static final Bean<?> returnNull(final BeanSelectionCriteria x, final Collection<? extends Bean<?>> xx) {
308    return null;
309  }
310
311
312  /*
313   * Inner and nested classes.
314   */
315
316
317  private static final class StockResolver implements Constable, Resolver {
318
319    private static final Resolver INSTANCE = new StockResolver();
320
321    private StockResolver() {
322      super();
323    }
324
325    @Override // Constable
326    public final Optional<DynamicConstantDesc<StockResolver>> describeConstable() {
327      return Optional.empty();
328    }
329
330  }
331
332  private static final class BeanCollector implements Collector<Bean<?>, LinkedHashSet<Bean<?>>, SequencedSet<Bean<?>>> {
333
334    private BeanCollector() {
335      super();
336    }
337
338    @Override // Collector<Bean<?>, LinkedHashSet<Bean<?>>, SequencedSet<Bean<?>>>
339    public final BiConsumer<LinkedHashSet<Bean<?>>, Bean<?>> accumulator() {
340      return LinkedHashSet::add;
341    }
342
343    @Override // Collector<Bean<?>, LinkedHashSet<Bean<?>>, SequencedSet<Bean<?>>>
344    public final Set<Characteristics> characteristics() {
345      return Set.of();
346    }
347
348    @Override // Collector<Bean<?>, LinkedHashSet<Bean<?>>, SequencedSet<Bean<?>>>
349    public final BinaryOperator<LinkedHashSet<Bean<?>>> combiner() {
350      return BeanCollector::merge;
351    }
352
353    @Override // Collector<Bean<?>, LinkedHashSet<Bean<?>>, SequencedSet<Bean<?>>>
354    public final Function<LinkedHashSet<Bean<?>>, SequencedSet<Bean<?>>> finisher() {
355      return Collections::unmodifiableSequencedSet;
356    }
357
358    @Override // Collector<Bean<?>, LinkedHashSet<Bean<?>>, SequencedSet<Bean<?>>>
359    public final Supplier<LinkedHashSet<Bean<?>>> supplier() {
360      return LinkedHashSet::new;
361    }
362
363    private static final <T, S extends Collection<T>> S merge(final S s0, final S s1) {
364      s0.addAll(s1);
365      return s0;
366    }
367
368
369  }
370
371}
